label: Intermediate Turkish II
description: Continuation of TURK 403; emphasis on the development of better receptive and productive language skills in Standard and Colloquial Turkish, with increased attention to both written and spoken texts. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: TURK 403 or equivalent.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: TURK 403 or equivalent.
